description: A sample project to demonstrate the RALPH loop

stories.title: Create hello world script
stories.description: Create a simple hello.sh script that prints 'Hello, RALPH!'

stories.title: Add greeting function
stories.description: Add a greet() function to hello.sh that takes a name parameter and prints 'Hello, {name}!'

stories.title: Add timestamp to greeting
stories.description: Modify the greet function to include the current timestamp in the output

steps.text: greet function includes timestamp in output

stories.title: Add farewell function
stories.description: Add a farewell() function to hello.sh that takes a name parameter and prints 'Goodbye, {name}! See you soon.'

steps.text: farewell 'World' outputs 'Goodbye, World! See you soon.'
farewell 'Alice' outputs 'Goodbye, Alice! See you soon.'

stories.title: Add color support
stories.description: Add color output support to hello.sh. Greetings should be green, farewells should be yellow. Add a --no-color flag to disable colors.

steps.text: greet output is green when run in terminal
farewell output is yellow when run in terminal
